<js>

zuozhe=java.getString("td[rowspan='2']@div.0@a@text").split("\n");
shijian=java.getString(".authorinfo em@text").split("\n");
neir=java.getString(".postmessage@tr@td@ownText").split("\n");
}
if(/books/.test(baseUrl)){	zuozhe=java.getString("@@.noveltitle@p.0@text").split("\n");
shijian=java.getString(".noveltitle@p.0@text").split("\n");
neir=java.getString(".novelcontent@ownText").split("\n");
}

//修整内容后依次拼接
for(i=0;i<zuozhe.length;i++){
txt=String(neir[i]).replace(/\s/g,"\n");
zz=String(zuozhe[i]).replace(/ 发表.*/,"");
sj=String(shijian[i]).replace(/.*发表/,"发表");
java.log(zz+lz);

//只看楼主
if (book.getVariable("custom")!=""){
  if(zz==lz){
  list=list+"\n@"+zz+"__"+sj+"\n"+txt+"\n————\n";
  }else{};
}else{list=list+"\n@"+zz+"__"+sj+"\n"+txt+"\n————\n";}
}
list
if(list==""){"未获取到内容，或许是因为“只看楼主”功能开启中\n请尝试在详情页点击右上角删除书籍变量，关闭只看楼主功能后刷新本页面"}
//}catch {"代码错误"}

<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

bookSourceComment: by·holzora
exploreUrl:
<js>
discover = [];
push = (title, url, style) => discover.push({ title: title, url: url, style: { layout_flexGrow: 1, layout_flexBasisPercent: style } });
addSlots = (count, style) => {
    remainder = count % 3;
    slotsAdd = remainder === 0 ? 0 : 3 - remainder;
    for (i = 0; i < slotsAdd; i++) {
        push("", null, style);
    }
};
push("收藏夹", null, 1);
try {
    favored = java.ajax(`${baseUrl}/api/user/favored`);
    if (favored.includes("Token")) {
        push("账号未登录", null, 0.25);
        addSlots(1, 0.25);
    } else {
        favoredData = JSON.parse(favored).favoredWeb;
        favoredData.forEach(item => {
            push(item.title, `/api/user/favored-web/${item.id}?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=30&sort=update`, 0.25);
        });
        addSlots(favoredData.length, 0.25);
    }
} catch (e) {
    push("未知错误", null, 0.25);
    addSlots(1, 0.25);
};
push("来源", null, 1);
providers = ["全部", "kakuyomu", "syosetu", "novelup", "hameln", "pixiv", "alphapolis"];
providers.forEach(provider => {
    url = provider === "全部" ? 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${providers.slice(1).join('%2C')}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0` : 
        `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=${provider}&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(provider, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(providers.length, 0.25);
push("类型", null, 1);
types = ["全部", "连载中", "已完结", "短篇"];
types.forEach((type, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=${index}&level=0&translate=0&sort=0`;
    push(type, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(types.length, 0.25);
push("排序", null, 1);
sorts = ["更新", "点击"];
sorts.forEach((sort, index) => {
    url = `/api/novel?page={{(page-1)}}&pageSize=20&query=&provider=kakuyomu%2Csyosetu%2Cnovelup%2Chameln%2Cpixiv%2Calphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=${index}`;
    push(sort, url, 0.25);
});
addSlots(sorts.length, 0.25);
JSON.stringify(discover);
</js>
header:
<js>
header = {
    "Referer": baseUrl
};
JSON.stringify(header);
</js>
loginUrl:
<js>
function login() {
    username = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号");
    password = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    url = `${baseUrl}/api/auth/sign-in`;
    body = JSON.stringify({
        emailOrUsername: username,
        password: password
    });
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
    };
    response = java.post(url, body, headers);
    responseBody = response.body();
    authorizationObject = {
        Authorization: `Bearer ${responseBody}`
    };
    header = JSON.stringify(authorizationObject);
    source.putLoginHeader(header);
}
login();
</js>

};

    body = java.ajax(url);
};
java.put('url', url);
body

ruleContent.content: value = String(book.getVariable("custom")) || String(source.getVariable()); get = (value >= '1' && value <= '9') ? value : '1'; config = { 1: 'sakuraParagraphs', 2: 'gptParagraphs', 3: 'youdaoParagraphs', 4: 'baiduParagraphs', 5: 'paragraphs' }; result = JSON.parse(result); content = result[config[get]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]] || result[config[5]]; if (['6', '7', '8', '9'].includes(get)) { type = ['6', '8'].includes(get); jpContent = result[config[5]]; cnContent = result[config[1]] || result[config[2]] || result[config[3]] || result[config[4]]; if (cnContent) { content = jpContent.flatMap((jp, i) => (type ? [cnContent[i], jp] : [jp, cnContent[i]])).filter(Boolean); } else { content = jpContent; } }; regex = content => { displayedImages = new Set(); return JSON.stringify(content).replace(/<图片>(https?:\/\/[^"\s]+)/g, (_, p1) => { if (displayedImages.has(p1)) return ''; displayedImages.add(p1); return ''; }); }; format = content => content.replace(/^\[|\]$/g, '').split(',').map(item => item.trim().replace(/^"|"$/g, '')).filter(Boolean).map((item, i) => item.startsWith('{"headers"') && i > 0 ? ',' + item : ' ' + item).join("\n"); format(regex(content));

searchUrl:
<js>
providers = {
    kakuyomu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?kakuyomu\.jp\/works\/(\d+)/,
    syosetu: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(ncode|novel18)\.syosetu\.com\/(\w+)/,
    novelup: /(?:https?:\/\/)?novelup\.plus\/story\/(\d+)/,
    hameln: /(?:https?:\/\/)?syosetu\.org\/novel\/(\d+)/,
    pixiv: /(?:https?:\/\/)?(www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/series\/(\d+)|www\.pixiv\.net\/novel\/show\.php\?id=(\d+))/,
    alphapolis: /(?:https?:\/\/)?www\.alphapolis\.co\.jp\/novel\/(\d+)\/(\d+)/,
    sakura: /(?:https?:\/\/)?books\d?\.fishhawk\.top\/(?:api\/)?novel\/(\w+)\/([\w-]+)/
};
for (provider in providers) {
    match = key.match(providers[provider]);
    if (match) {
        providerId = provider === 'sakura' ? match[1] : provider;
        novelId = provider === 'alphapolis' ? `${match[1]}-${match[2]}` : provider === 'pixiv' ? (match[3] ? `s${match[3]}` : match[2]) : (match[2] || match[1]);
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel/${providerId}/${novelId}`;
        break;
    } else {
        url = `${baseUrl}/api/novel?page=${page-1}&pageSize=20&query=${key}&provider=kakuyomu,syosetu,novelup,hameln,pixiv,alphapolis&type=0&level=0&translate=0&sort=1`;
    }
    url
}
</js>
variableComment: 输入对应数字刷新即可获取对应文本，{1: "sakura译文", 2: "gpt译文", 3: "有道译文", 4: "百度译文", 5: "原文", 6: "中日", 7: "日中", 8: "5+6", 9: "5+7"}，默认sakura译文。书籍变量作用于一本书，源变量作用于整个书源，书籍变量优先级高于源变量。

if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
   u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
   cookie.removeCookie(u)
   // java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
   head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

searchUrl:
<js> 
//注意：一般网站默认首页(即baseUrl)有搜索框，否则请填入搜索页面地址
var url = baseUrl;
if (!baseUrl.match(/^https?:/i)) {
    java.log('\n\n\n\n‼️请填入正确的Url‼️\n\n\n\n');
}
var html = java.ajax(url + ",{'webView': true}");
//java.log(html);
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
var form = doc.select('form[action]:not([name~=login]):not([class~=login]):not([id~=login])')[0];
//java.log(form);
var method = form.attr('method');
var action = form.attr('action');
var charset = doc.select('head>meta[charset]').attr('charset');
if (charset == '')
{
    charset = String(doc.select('head>meta[content~=charset=]').attr('content')).replace(/^.*charset=([a-z0-9\-]+).*$/i, 
    '$1');
}
//java.log(method);
//java.log(action);
//java.log(charset);
//桌面版UA
var uaw = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36";
//手机版UA
var uam = "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 7.0; wv) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/4.0 Chrome/48.0.2564.116 Mobile Safari/537.36 T7/10.3 SearchCraft/2.6.2 (baiduboxapp; P1 7.0)";
var headers = {
    //请自行选择UA，↓↓↓填入此处
    "User-Agent" : uam, "Referer" : String(baseUrl)
};
url = baseUrl.replace(/([^\/])$/i, '$1/') + String(action).replace(/^\//, '');
var body = '';
var option = {};
var sk = form.select('input[name][type="text"],input[name][class="text"]').attr('name');
//java.log(sk);
var es = form.select('input[name]:not([type="submit"])');
for (var it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.attr('value');
    if (k == sk) {
        //body+=sk+'={{java.encodeURI(key,\''+ charset+'\');}}&';
        body += sk + '={{key}}&';
    }
    else {
        body += k + '=' + v + '&';
    }
}
es = form.select('select[name]');
for (it in es)
{
    var e = es[it];
    var k = e.attr('name');
    var v = e.select('option')[0].attr('value');
    body += k + '=' + v + '&';
}
body = String(body).replace(/&$/, '');
java.log(body);
if (method.match(/post/i))
{
    option = 
    {
        "charset" : String(charset), "method" : String(method), "body" : String(body), "headers" : headers, 
        "webView" : true 
    };
    url += ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
else
{
    //get
    option = {
        "charset" : String(charset), "headers" : headers, "webView" : true 
    };
    url += '?' + body + ',' + JSON.stringify(option);
}
java.log(url);
</js>

result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
.replace(/(第\d+章)\s\d+(.*)/,'$1$2')
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){ html = java.ajax("https://read.douban.com"); eval(html.match(/Ark\.(user = \{[\s\S]+?\})/)[1]); cok = user.id??"anonymous"; java.log("cok: "+cok) t = java.getString("$.data"); script = ``; ddd = java.webView(script,baseUrl,"result"); //规范Json数据 // 定义正则表达式 const pattern = /:"(.*?)"([,\]\}])/g; // 替换逻辑 ddd = String(ddd).replace(pattern, (match, content,suffix) => { // 将内容中的双引号替换为转义字符 const replacedContent = content.replace(/"/g, '\\"'); // 返回替换后的结果 return `:"${replacedContent}"${suffix}`; }).replace(/\n+/g,'\\n').replace(/[\x00-\x1F\x7F]/g,''); var data = JSON.parse(String(ddd)); function extractContent(item) { const textList = item.data?.text; const process = (content) => { if (typeof content === 'string') { return content; } if (Array.isArray(content)) { return content.map(process).join(''); } if (content && content.content) { return process(content.content); } return ''; }; return typeof textList === 'string' ? textList : process(textList); } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let currentChapter = -1; let isFirstHeadlineFound = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { currentChapter++; if (!isFirstHeadlineFound) { isFirstHeadlineFound = true; } if (currentChapter > chapterNumber) { break; } } if ((currentChapter === chapterNumber) || (chapterNumber === 0 && !isFirstHeadlineFound && item.type !== 'headline')) { if(item.type === "illus")chapterContent.push(`\n`); if(item.type !== 'headline')chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // 检查是否需要使用章节逻辑 if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // 遍历数据，提取并拼接 content data.forEach(item => { if(item.type === "illus")result += `\n` result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // 每个段落换行 }); } }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `❗️刷新本章跳转加入书架界面❗️\n书名：${bookName}\n作者：${bookAuthor}\n\n简介：\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, 《${bookName}》加入书架

跳转加入书架

简介：${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"《"+bookName+"》") } } result

<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="{{source.getKey()}}/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节|免费章节.|章节目录)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3
ruleBookInfo.name: [property$=book_name]@content

                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content
        }</js>

  //showjname设置章节名显示卷名true or false
  let obj = {showjname: false}
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.volumes.forEach((booklet) => {
  	  java.put('jname',booklet.name)
    array.push({ 
    	    name:'◆◇'+String(booklet.name)+'◇◆',
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.chapters.forEach((chapter) => {
href='http://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&version=002&os=android&udid=1c5b2618a57a0848e2510649dc1e03896f462284&appverion=1122&ch=blf1298_12337_001&session_id=-nEvkqSq_9ZyORN5OoVOOzJ&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=3&pushid=f97b7f81a269472c07708277b7c40b4f&ptype=5&gender=0&userInitPay=3&birt=1658424532472&instime=1658424529924&instId=1658424529924&chType=3&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&gid='+java.get('gid')+'&nid='+chapter.nid+'&sort='+chapter.sort+'&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=4&chapter_name='+chapter.chapter_name
      array.push({
        name: !java.get('jname')?chapter.chapter_name:((obj.showjname?'※'+java.get('jname')+'※ ':'').padStart(3,''))+chapter.chapter_name,
        url: href,
        time:"本章字数:"+String(chapter.wordCount)+"字",
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="{{source.getKey()}}/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

cimg=[]; if(String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)){ b=String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)[1];} else{b=''} if(String(result).match(/"size":\s*"[^"]+",\s*"url":\s*"[^"]+"/g)){ a=String(result).match(/"size":\s*"[^"]+",\s*"url":\s*"[^"]+"/g); for (i=0;i\n' }}else{html=''} if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(result)){ $ = result.match(/"page_info":\s*(\{[\s\S]+?\}),\s+"bid/)[1]; $ = JSON.parse($); html = '\n' } if(!baseUrl.match(/ttarticle/)){ result = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(b).html()+'\n'+html+java.getString("@@class.h5-4con@html")}else{result=java.getString("@@class.f-art@html")} if(/暂无目录....../.test(chapter.title)){ result = book.intro } if(/是\d+条/.test(source.bookSourceComment) && !baseUrl.match(/ttarticle/) && /detail/.test(baseUrl)){ page = source.bookSourceComment.match(/是(\d+)条/)[1]; page = Math.ceil(page/20); mid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)$/)[1]; max_id="0"; comments=""; count = 0; for(j=1;j<=page;j++){ commentsurl = `https://m.weibo.cn/comments/hotflow?id=${mid}&mid=${mid}&max_id=${max_id}&max_id_type=0`; hh= java.ajax(commentsurl); if(/体验微博客户端/.test(hh)){ h={}; page = 2; }else{ h = JSON.parse(hh) } if(h.ok==1){ list=h.data.data; max_id = h.data.max_id; if(j==1){ total = Math.ceil(h.data.total_number/20); page= page<=total?page:total; } for(i=0;i

<js>
d=/"text": "(.*)",/.test(result)?String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)[1]:"暂无目录";
b=d.replace(/<.*?>/g,"").replace(/#.*?#/g,"");
c=baseUrl;
l=[];

if(/网页链接/.test(d) || /timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
	if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
	l.push({
		href:result.match(/"page_url": "([^"]+)",/)[1]+",{'webView':true}",
		text:result.match(/"content1": "([^"]+)",/)[1],
		info:result.match(/ "content2": "([^"]+)",/)[1]
		})
}

if(/网页链接/.test(d)){
	list = d.match(/<br \/>[^<]+<a  href=\\"[^"]+\\" data-hid/g);
	l.push({
		text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",
		href:c
		})
	for(i in list){
	l.push({
		text : list[i].match(/>([^<]+)<a/)[1],
		href:list[i].match(/href=\\"([^"]+)\\"/)[1]
		})
	  }
	}
	}else{
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
		}
		l
</js>

list=[]

for(i in lis){
	surl=lis[i].attr('href')
	if(surl!=''){
		temp={
			"name":lis[i].text(),
			"surl":surl
			}
			list.push(temp)
		}
		surl=''
	}
	//java.log(JSON.stringify(list))
	list
</js>

	}}

{{
	uptime=java.getString('$.book.content_updated_at')
	lastuptime=source.getVariable()==''?
	   '2000-01-01T01:00:00':source.getVariable()
	source.setVariable(String(uptime))
 uptime=new Date(String(uptime))

}]

searchUrl:
<js>
  u=source.getKey().match(/([^\#]+)\#/)[1];
  cookie.removeCookie(u);
	hm=java.get(u,{});	cs=decodeURIComponent(String(hm.header("Set-Cookie")).replace(/[eE]xpires[^;]+;|[pP]ath=\/;|,|httponly|\s/g,'').replace(/^;|;$/g,''));	token=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(hm.body()).select('input[name="_token"]').attr('value');
s=page>1?'&page='+page:'';	body="_token="+token+"&kw="+key+s;
	head={"cookie":cs}
	post={
		"method": "POST",
		"body":body,
		"headers":head
	}
u+"/search/,"+JSON.stringify(post)
</js>

bookSourceComment: 有时候网站会报错 502 导致书源请求失败，暂不清楚是网站限制访问频率，还是单纯的网站后端问题，我尝试加上遇到 502 就自动重试一次，发现还是直接 502，所以也没啥好办法，建议遇到搜索/发现/详情/目录/正文为空时，可以重试一次（目录/正文则是再 刷新 一次）

也可以直接把网络导入链接复制到浏览器下载，之后再找到该书源导入。
怎么找到书源下载到内部存储的位置，可以用文件管理器，搜索文件名字，在详情或属性里找路径，之后在阅读软件中进行本地导入，按照这个路径找到该书源文件导入即可。

bookSourceComment:
该书源正文被分成了几页，导致一些句子被中间截断，我做了一些处理，对于这种：
"他轻轻咳嗽了
两声，提醒了一下。"
样子被截断的句子（也就是截断处的末尾是一个 汉字 或 阿拉伯数字 而非标点符号之类的），书源会将其拼合起来，并且为了避免误伤，我也做了特殊处理，书源会使用 "㏒" 符号来标记分页处（我专门找了个这种在网络小说界及其冷门的小众符号，避免误伤），书源只会检查分页处有该符号的文字是否被截断。
搜索间隔时间不能太短
